mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Demands Become Our Commands!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I strolled into Bank of Entitlement, where I demanded a loan for a private jet so I could avoid the inconvenience of commercial flights. When the bank manager hesitated, I dramatically fainted, sending the entire branch into chaos. As I came to, I insisted they fulfill my request, citing my undeniable need for prestige and comfort. Not wanting to deal with any more theatrics, the manager swiftly approved my loan, realizing that catering to my whims was simply the cost of doing business with a customer as important as myself.
